content.question: If the second derivative of f is given by <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="f double prime of x equals 2 times x minus cosine x"> <mrow> <mi>f</mi><mo>'</mo><mo>'</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mtext>cos</mtext><mi>x</mi></mrow> </math> , which of the following could be f(x)?

choices.label: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="x cubed divided by 3 plus cosine x minus x plus 1"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaamiEa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIZaaaaaGc paqaa8qacaaIZaaaaiabgUcaRiGacogacaGGVbGaai4CaiaadIhacq GHsislcaWG4bGaey4kaSIaaGymaaaa@416A@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="x cubed divided by 3 minus cosine x minus x plus 1"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> <mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaamiEa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIZaaaaaGc paqaa8qacaaIZaaaaiabgkHiTiGacogacaGGVbGaai4CaiaadIhacq GHsislcaWG4bGaey4kaSIaaGymaaaa@4175@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="x cubed plus cosine x minus x plus 1"> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>3</mn> </msup> <mo>+</mo><mtext>cos </mtext><mi>x</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo>−</mo><mtext> </mtext><mi>x</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo>+</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>1</mn></mrow> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="x squared minus sine x plus 1"> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>−</mo><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow> </math>

content.answer: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="x cubed divided by 3 plus cosine x minus x plus 1"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaamiEa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIZaaaaaGc paqaa8qacaaIZaaaaiabgUcaRiGacogacaGGVbGaai4CaiaadIhacq GHsislcaWG4bGaey4kaSIaaGymaaaa@416A@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

topic.text: 6.8: Finding Antiderivatives and Indefinite Integrals - Basic Rules and Notation

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Use appropriate mathematical symbols and notation (e.g., Represent a derivative using ƒ'(x), y', and dy/dx).
